meanings.definition: In a cycle or in a recurring pattern.
meanings.sent1: The seasons change cyclically throughout the year.
meanings.sent2: The planets move cyclically in their orbits.
meanings.sent3: The clock ticked cyclically, reminding everyone of the passing time.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts circled cyclically around the same worries.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashed cyclically against the shore, creating a soothing rhythm.

meanings.sent4: His jokes followed a cyclically predictable pattern, making them easy to anticipate.
meanings.sent5: The birds chirped cyclically every morning, signaling the start of a new day.
